errors.error_description: Changed the installation command from 'python -m pip install briefcase' to 'pip install briefcase==2.1.0', which uses direct pip instead of python module and pins to a specific version that may not exist or be compatible
Pinned installation to a specific version (2.1.0) which may not exist or be the latest compatible version, creating version compatibility issues
correction_candidates: Remove the version specification and use: pip install briefcase
Use the latest version specifier: pip install briefcase>=2.0.0
Install from development branch: pip install git+https://github.com/beeware/briefcase.git
Use version range: pip install briefcase~=2.0
errors.golden_answer: Remove the version specification and use: pip install briefcase
